body.name: Popglory Smart Watch for Men, Military Smartwatch with Answer/Dial Calls, Outdoors Tactical Sports Rugged Fitness Tracker Watch with 1.91" HD Screen, Heart Rate/BP/SpO2 Monitor for iOS & Android
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 12 mins
features: Military Smart Watch For Men & 2*22mm Straps: The 1.91" HD large screen watch is sturdy and suitable for use in extreme environments, including high temperature, dust, salt spray, low pressure, fluid pollution and so on. The fitness tracker for men will come with a pure strap and an extra dual color strap. You can rotate the side button to switch dials or customize the watch faces in the app.

Call With Smart Watch & AI Voice Control: You can use the watch to make/answer calls directly and quickly call your emergency contacts to seek help through the new SOS feature. You can see the social notifications on your wrist. And it supports playing music and adjusting/turning off the media volume. You can even voice control the watch to complete various commands.

Rugged Outdoor Sports Watch For Men & More Functions: The fitness watch for men provides 100+ sports modes, covering both indoor and outdoor sports enthusiasts. Daily activity monitoring includes steps, heart rate, calories and distance. You could track your weekly report in GloryFit app. There are more practical functions like calculator, breathing training, weather forecast, timer and stopwatch, remote camera, sedentary reminder, password setting and much more.

Health Monitoring & Smart Alerts: H52 smart watch for men helps you concerns about your day and night. It can measure blood pressure, regular blood oxygen, 24/7 heart rate and track your sleep at night. You can set max/min heart rate values in the app. Whenever this value is exceeded or dropped below, the watch will vibrate to remind you. Note: All data are for fitness reference only, not for medical use.

Compatibility & Long Battery: The military watch is IPX8 waterproof, suitable for your daily activities. You can use the tracker with GloryFit app and it only works with smartphones iOS 11.0 and higher or Android 5.0 and higher. With 2 hours charging, the watch can be daily used up to 10 days or standby for 30 days.
Ease of Use: This watch is easy to operate, with an intuitive interface and simple controls, making it an easy watch to use on the go.

productInformation.name: Compatible Phone Models
productInformation.value: iOS 11.0 or above & Android 5.0 or above smartphones

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Battery is long lasting and display and app are both good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Finally a smart watch with a decent App!
reviews.reviewText: I haven't owned this watch very long, but already I'm noticing a big difference with it compared to other similar smartwatches. It's much more responsive to touch, the health monitoring apps are much more detailed and thorough, and the App used for connecting with mobile devices is the BEST compared to the other 2 common Apps (DaFit & FitCloudPro) that most military-style smartwatches use.I hope I've finally found my match and won't need to look any further.Good luck, Shoppers. Cheers.2nd EDIT:I just received another order for this watch, hopinh the first one was just a defective unit. But this one has the same issue with the blood pressure readings being off by more than 20 points! I use the actual device to measure and monitor it my blood pressure, but I need a smartwatch that could continuously measure my blood pressure in 10 minute intervals so i can see how the trend looks throughout the day and also at night when I'm asleep.Everything else about this watch is next to perfect...If you want a premium smartwatch that's also affordable, and monitoring your blood pressure isn't your goal, I'd recommend this watch with all my heart. The user interface is more user friendly than any smartwatch I've tried. The App used to connect to this watch was also well made (GloryFit App).1st EDIT:I noticed my blood pressure readings are way off.It's much, much lower than it actually is.The heart rate monitor is reading just fine, so I know I'm not just wearing it wrong.I really hope this unit is simply defective, as I was so glad I thought I finally found the right Smartwatch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fitness for the Fit
reviews.reviewText: I love the fitness watch. It gives me all the information i need without the huge expense

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Practical Functional Smart Watch
reviews.reviewText: I mainly use to check heart rates, blood pressure, oxygen level and steps.It is doing a good job and battery is easy to be charged in a short period for a week's use depending on how frequently you use it. Comparing to the one I discarded after one month for the same price, this one is better for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've never had a smart band be so inaccurate with sleep tracking. Either nothing is recorded, or it says I went to sleep hours later than I actually did. I tried wearing it loose, tight, and in between through multiple nights. Because of this, I'm thinking my steps and other things that are tracked are inaccurate as well. I contacted their support through a form on their site early on, and I've never received a response. I'm thinking I will be returning very soon. ... I had high hopes for this, especially with the ratings and reviews. I wish my Amazon Halo wasn't being discontinued. This PopGlory watch was replacing it for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit The Watch Perfectly
reviews.reviewText: It fit my wife's, and my watch perfectly, and slightly more comfortable than the original one. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to install
reviews.reviewText: It was a challenge to install this band, took what seemed like forever. I also expected it to be softer. Sometimes it leaves a mark on my wrist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent multi-function watch, except ...
reviews.reviewText: I love this watch. I returned it only because the blood pressure monitor was inaccurate - that was important to me. But every other function worked flawlessly and displays are great.
Montre très pratique fonctionne très bien
Das Kabel passt genau zu meiner Uhr. Ich hatte das Kabel verloren und kann nun endlich die Uhr wieder nutzen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: It is compatible with the Popglory P22C
reviews.reviewText: This works! It works for my P22C model of the Popglory smartwatch. All I will say is that the magnet is not as strong as the one that came with my watch. It is still relatively strong tho and connects easily to the charging port. Overall would recommend for anyone who needs to replace or purchase a spare charger for their Popglory P22C smartwatch.
